concept.title: Administration Guide History
concept.shortdesc: This section contains information about changes to the administration documentation in this release.

ul.li: We deleted all references to the deprecated Administrator Console.
We removed the topic, Caching Images on the Cluster Controller. This is because the CC no longer caches images in the new 4.0.0 design.
We changed the SSL configuration for the User Console. For more information, see .
